site_name: Manor Park Works, Manor Park Road, London
description: Details pursuant to condition 5 (Fencing, walls, gateways and means of enclosure) of Variation of Conditions reference 21/0604 dated 15 October, 2021, for Variation of condition 2 development built in accordance with approved plans to allow:SITE:Bin store repositioned to the west with an additional bin; relocation of cycle store to the centre of the site; reposition of disabled parking bay; and adjustment to the site gradient. CONVERTED BUILDING: Reduction in core footprint and rationalisation at roof level; repositioning of entrance to unit 04; removal of trellis frame; revised entrance and fa‡ade design, increased size of terraces; windows bricked. NEW BUILDING:  Reduction in the size of the basement; Cycle store relocated to ground floor; reposition of the 'pop-out' windows; reduction in core footprint and rationalisation at roof level; revised entrance design; removal of trellis frame; Increased size of terraces; 'pop-out' windows removed at fifth floor; building line to remove step at ground/upper ground floor; and alterations to the fa‡ade design of Full Planning Permission reference 17/2331 dated 19 October, 2017, approved under planning appeal reference APP/T5150/W18/3194879 dated 12th December 2018, for Redevelopment of industrial site to residential to form a total of 45 units comprising: change of use of the existing building from industrial and storage (B1 and B8) to residential (C3), accommodating 24 units (2 x studios, 8 x 1bed, 10 x 2bed and 4 x 3bed maisonettes) and an extension above the existing building with alterations to form 7 storeys; and erection of an 8 storey residential building plus a basement level, accommodating 21 units (3x studios, 14 ž 2bed and 1 x 2bed and 3 x 3 bed maisonettes) with associated car and cycle parking, refuse storage, landscaping and amenity space provision, including a roof terrace at each building (amended plans, fire safety information and description updated 12/09/2017).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
